lst.name: sentence
lst.str: CAIRO - The ruling National Democratic Party of President Hosni Mubarak took 75 pct of the seven mln votes cast in Monday's general election, but incomplete official results indicated some Socialist and Moslem Brotherhood gains.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: BAHRAIN - Iranian forces have renewed their assault on Iraqi lines defending the southern city of Basra and gained what Baghdad described as "footholds" on Iraqi territory.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: BELFAST - A British soldier was shot and seriously hurt in Northern Ireland and buses and lorries were hijacked and set on fire after mourners clashed with police at an Irish Republican Army funeral.
